text:
Our very own Dr. Esteban Olivera will be speaking 2/26 10am-11:30am on the COVID Treatment & Vaccine for Persons Living w/ Dementia.
Join us for this pivotal discussion to our community!
Register at the link in the flyer!#ClinCloud #CaregiverCommunity #dementia #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/6bvXYkX3zh
